languages.text: "Бесхребетная падаль!" {n}Один из ксеносов, наблюдавших за Ирлиэт, подается вперед и срывает с груди мертвой эльдарки пылающий алым драгоценный камень.{/n} "По крайней мере мне хватит эманаций ее вечно страдающей души. Прочь с дороги, мон-кай!"

traits.locale_text: "Бесхребетная падаль!" {n}Один из ксеносов, наблюдавших за Ирлиэт, подается вперед и срывает с груди мертвой эльдарки пылающий алым драгоценный камень.{/n} "По крайней мере мне хватит эманаций ее вечно страдающей души. Прочь с дороги, мон-кай!"
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: "Spineless carrion!" {n}One of the xenos who were observing Yrliet leans forward and tears the radiant crimson gemstone from her chest.{/n} "At least I will savour the emanations of her soul's eternal agony. Out of my way, mon-keigh!"
languages.original_text: "Бесхребетная падаль!" {n}Один из ксеносов, наблюдавших за Ирлиэт, подается вперед и срывает с груди мертвой эльдарки пылающий алым драгоценный камень.{/n} "По крайней мере мне хватит эманаций ее вечно страдающей души. Прочь с дороги, мон-кай!"

traits.locale_text: "Spineless carrion!" {n}One of the xenos who were observing Yrliet leans forward and tears the radiant crimson gemstone from her chest.{/n} "At least I will savour the emanations of her soul's eternal agony. Out of my way, mon-keigh!"
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

traits.locale_text: "Spineless carrion!" {n}One of the xenos who were observing Yrliet leans forward and tears the radiant crimson gemstone from her chest.{/n} "At least I will savour the emanations of her soul's eternal agony. Out of my way, mon-keigh!"
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: 「薄汚い腰抜けめ！」{n}ユリエットを観察していた異種族のひとりが身を乗り出し、彼女の胸から輝く真紅の宝石を引きちぎる。{/n}「この女の魂の永遠の苦しみだけでも味わってやろう。どけ、モン＝ケイ！」
languages.original_text: "Spineless carrion!" {n}One of the xenos who were observing Yrliet leans forward and tears the radiant crimson gemstone from her chest.{/n} "At least I will savour the emanations of her soul's eternal agony. Out of my way, mon-keigh!"

traits.locale_text: 「薄汚い腰抜けめ！」{n}ユリエットを観察していた異種族のひとりが身を乗り出し、彼女の胸から輝く真紅の宝石を引きちぎる。{/n}「この女の魂の永遠の苦しみだけでも味わってやろう。どけ、モン＝ケイ！」
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: “你这没骨气的烂肉！”{n}一个正在观察伊莉耶特的异形俯下身子，从她胸前扯下了那颗闪闪发光的深红色宝石。{/n}“至少我可以永远品尝她灵魂中的痛苦。别挡我的路，猴子！”
languages.original_text: "Spineless carrion!" {n}One of the xenos who were observing Yrliet leans forward and tears the radiant crimson gemstone from her chest.{/n} "At least I will savour the emanations of her soul's eternal agony. Out of my way, mon-keigh!"

traits.locale_text: “你这没骨气的烂肉！”{n}一个正在观察伊莉耶特的异形俯下身子，从她胸前扯下了那颗闪闪发光的深红色宝石。{/n}“至少我可以永远品尝她灵魂中的痛苦。别挡我的路，猴子！”
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: «¡Carroña cobarde!». {n}Uno de los xenos que observaban a Yrliet se inclina hacia delante y le arranca la radiante gema carmesí del pecho.{/n} «Al menos saborearé las emanaciones de la agonía eterna de su alma. ¡Fuera de mi camino, mon-keigh!».
languages.original_text: "Spineless carrion!" {n}One of the xenos who were observing Yrliet leans forward and tears the radiant crimson gemstone from her chest.{/n} "At least I will savour the emanations of her soul's eternal agony. Out of my way, mon-keigh!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Carroña cobarde!». {n}Uno de los xenos que observaban a Yrliet se inclina hacia delante y le arranca la radiante gema carmesí del pecho.{/n} «Al menos saborearé las emanaciones de la agonía eterna de su alma. ¡Fuera de mi camino, mon-keigh!».
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: "Rückgratlose Aasgeier!" {n}Einer der Xenos, die Yrliet beobachtet haben, beugt sich vor und reißt den strahlend roten Edelstein von ihrer Brust.{/n} "Endlich kann ich die Ausdünstungen der ewigen Pein ihre Seele kosten. Aus dem Weg, Chem-Pan-Sey!"
languages.original_text: "Spineless carrion!" {n}One of the xenos who were observing Yrliet leans forward and tears the radiant crimson gemstone from her chest.{/n} "At least I will savour the emanations of her soul's eternal agony. Out of my way, mon-keigh!"

traits.locale_text: "Rückgratlose Aasgeier!" {n}Einer der Xenos, die Yrliet beobachtet haben, beugt sich vor und reißt den strahlend roten Edelstein von ihrer Brust.{/n} "Endlich kann ich die Ausdünstungen der ewigen Pein ihre Seele kosten. Aus dem Weg, Chem-Pan-Sey!"
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: « Vile charogne ! » {n}L'un des xénos qui observaient Yrliet se penche en avant et arrache la gemme écarlate de sa poitrine.{/n} « Avec ça, au moins, je pourrai savourer l'éternelle agonie de son âme. Hors de mon chemin, mon-keigh ! »
languages.original_text: "Spineless carrion!" {n}One of the xenos who were observing Yrliet leans forward and tears the radiant crimson gemstone from her chest.{/n} "At least I will savour the emanations of her soul's eternal agony. Out of my way, mon-keigh!"

traits.locale_text: « Vile charogne ! » {n}L'un des xénos qui observaient Yrliet se penche en avant et arrache la gemme écarlate de sa poitrine.{/n} « Avec ça, au moins, je pourrai savourer l'éternelle agonie de son âme. Hors de mon chemin, mon-keigh ! »
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit

languages.text: "Ödlek sıçan!" {n}Yrliet'i gözlemleyen zenolardan biri, öne eğilerek Yrliet'in göğsündeki ışıltılı ve kızıl renkli taşı söküp alıyor.{/n} "En azından ruhunun çekeceği ebedî ızdırabın sızıntılarına doyabilirim. Çekil önümden mon-keigh!"
languages.original_text: "Spineless carrion!" {n}One of the xenos who were observing Yrliet leans forward and tears the radiant crimson gemstone from her chest.{/n} "At least I will savour the emanations of her soul's eternal agony. Out of my way, mon-keigh!"

traits.locale_text: "Ödlek sıçan!" {n}Yrliet'i gözlemleyen zenolardan biri, öne eğilerek Yrliet'in göğsündeki ışıltılı ve kızıl renkli değerli taşı söküp alıyor.{/n} "En azından ruhunun çekeceği ebedî ızdırabın sızıntılarının tadını çıkarabilirim. Çekil önümden mon-keigh!"
traits.speaker: DrukhariBandit
